entension.block-service.downloadBlock.ge: Failed to obtain url, please copy and open <%= repository %> in browse.
entension.block-service.downloadBlock.un: Error in unzipping <%= blockName %>，please copy and download from this url: ：<%= tarballURL %>
entension.block-service.downloadBlock.do: Block <%= blockName %> download timeout, please copy and download from this url: ：<%= tarballURL %>
entension.block-service.downloadError: Failed to obtain zips from <%= blockSourceNpm %> ，try to clone the <%= repository %> repository manually.
entension.block-service.uzipError: Failed to unzip <%= blockName %>，download from：<%= tarballURL %>
entension.block-service.templateError: You can only add block codes to  <%= jsxFileExtnames %>
entension.block-service.notPageFileError: You can only add block codes to files in <%= pagesPath %>
entension.block-service.obtainDone: > The block code has been downloaded to <%= blockDir %>
